creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
markings: Stamp in blue, verso, lower left: [circle with initials D.F.P.] [Lugt 750a]
inscribed:
In graphite, verso, lower left: D. 56 Romney [with X above in red pencil] | Crayon + Sepia 11 1/2 x 7 1/4 | (Ex. Humphrey Wood Coll.) | London, 1925 [in Platt's hand]
In graphite, verso, lower center: Crayon + Sepia wash | Romney Ex. Humphrey Wood
